sub_title: Investment Manager at Triodos Energy Transition Europe Fund
summary:
Acquisition and structuring of finance solutions for renewable energy generation, storage and distribution as well as climate change adaptation.

A Jack-of-all-Trades. I combine creative and strategic mindset with quantitative analyses and problem solving to contribute to the energy transition and do my part to mitigate- and adapt our economy to climate change. I am able to switch between the strategic level of business development towards the operational and detailed level of legal documentation for specific loan transactions. My interest is piqued by entrepreneurs and business models combining economic common sense with climate change impact.
